about_the_game:
Goodie Package

This DLC does not add any content to the game. It is strictly a supplemental package to provide players with a way of supporting us and getting a little something back for it. It's more of a Behind the Scenes type of package
In the package you will find:
  • Wallpapers (desktop and mobile)
  • CG Gallery (including animation gifs)
  • Concept Art
  • Videos/Time Lapse recordings showing us creating scenes and characters (two include text commentaries)
  • Our Appreciation...

DLC will be installed in the game's root folder and can be accessed there.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted are over the age of 18.
Sexual Content:
-Nudity from partial to full
-Voyeurism
-Assisted masturbation
-Vanilla sex
-Suggestive poses
